message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I'm looking to stay within a budget of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider a price of $11,000?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This product is truly top-of-the-line and worth every penny.
I understand your point about the product being top-of-the-line, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12,000?
